name: UPlaneCutToolProperties
doc: Standard properties of the plane cut operation

bKeepBothHalves: If true, both halves of the cut are computed
SpacingBetweenHalves: If keeping both halves, separate the two pieces by this amount
bExportSeparatedPiecesAsNewMeshAssets: If true, meshes cut into multiple pieces will be saved as separate assets on 'accept'.
bFillCutHole: If true, the cut surface is filled with simple planar hole fill surface(s)
bFillSpans: If true, will attempt to fill cut holes even if they're ill-formed (e.g. because they connect to pre-existing holes in the geometry)
bSimplifyAlongCut: If true, will simplify triangulation along plane cut when doing so will not affect the shape, UVs or PolyGroups
